QuestData.Title: Cave of Ai'twen
QuestData.Description:
Toki has researched a strategy that is historically sound. However to defeat the Venture Company, we will have to awaken Ai'twen from the bubble of tranquil waters.
Seek out Loroja in the Cave of Ai'twen and we shall begin the process.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Loroja in the Cave of Ai'twen.
QuestData.RewardText: Your presence here can only mean one thing. Ai'twen's help is needed.
